About the Game

The official soundtrack of Mallow Drops contains twenty tracks composed by Meghann O'Neill and Joel Pearson.

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: OS X version Leopard 10.5.8, Snow Leopard 10.6.3, or later.
  • Processor: Intel Mac 2.5 GHz
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Storage: 100 MB available space

name: Mallow Drops Original Soundtrack

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows XP, Vista, 7, 8 or later
  • Processor: 2.5 GHz
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Direct X9.0c Compatible Card
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Storage: 100 MB available space
